name: Hunting Cat Survival Simulator 3D
description:
Enjoy the whole life of this beautiful home pet – a little fluffy cat! Start your game being a really small and inoffensive kitten, explore this large human’s place trying to find something really interesting and feel like a curious and fidgety animal! Try our Hunting Cat Survival Simulator 3D game and have fun!
This human’s house is full of different dangers like dogs, other cats and rats – try to fight them all and level your kitty up! Lounge lazily about the house and courtyard, chase mice and rats, hunt little insects and just enjoy your life! Make friends with the other cats or fight with them – this choice is up to you! Beware of a large dog at the courtyard, ‘cause it’s too dangerous to fight with it unskilled!
Don’t forget to mind your health, food and energy indicators - if one of them drops, you may find yourself with one fluffy pad in a grave! Earn points for each successfully done mission and power your super cute home cat up making it more dexterous, speedy and healthier! Unlock different colorful skins to customize your cat as you really wish! Check our new Hunting Cat Survival Simulator 3D and have fun!
Make friends with the other cats or fight with them – this choice is up to you! Find another cat, lead it to your comfortable living place, mate and raise your own family of cute little kitties! Search for food roaming about this large human house, take it to your kittens and protect all your family from the cruel predators’ attacks!
Hunting Cat Survival Simulator 3D features:
• Ultimate cute home cat life simulator
• Various types of interesting surviving missions
• Many colorful skins to customize your home pet
• Realistic 3D graphics
Become one of the cutest animals all over the world! Roam about the house and courtyard, fight with different animals, find your mate and just enjoy Hunting Cat Survival Simulator 3D!
